post.description:
Import product data from id. Note: This does not create a product, it only retrieves
data.
Import and create a product from Oda based on ID.

get.description: Retrieve a single recipe instance based in recipe id.

OdaProductClassifierRecord.title: OdaProductClassifierRecord
OdaProductClassifierRecord.description:
Classifiers are specific product attributes at Oda. Such as:
- Dangerous good
- Very tender
- Very fresh
- Is frozen
- is organic
- Vegan
- Lactose free
- Gluten free

searchKeywords.x-helpText: Separate with spaces. Title is included by default.

externalUrl.x-helpText: Direct link to the recipe on a provider's site

isVegetarian.x-helpText: The recipe does not contain any meat or fish products.

ingredients.x-helpText: Specify ingredients seperated by a comma. E.g. milk, egg, sugar.

allergens.x-helpText: Specify allergens seperated by a comma. E.g. milk, egg, sugar.
